thread.section_title: Room Mate Grace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel in the heart of NYC!
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel in the heart of NYC! - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TD_Michelle
title: Wonderful hotel in the heart of NYC!
text:
Room Mate Grace was the perfect hotel for my stay in NYC: quiet despite the central location just off Times Square, a perfect location for walking the island, warm and welcoming staff, big and clean room, lots of amenities, the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in, and a great price. My only regret is that I didn't have time to use the indoor pool and sauna.
Due to its central location there are numerous and varied eating options nearby. I especially enjoyed Connolly's next door, where you can also enjoy live music. All the major theaters are within walking distance, as are many top sights and the subway.
The best part was the staff who were fabulous and made the stay even more comfortable and fun (special hello to Marc!). Happily, I'll be visiting NYC often for work and I'll definitely stay here again!
